name: devloop
description: Token-conscious feature development workflow with enhanced engineer agent (6 new skills, mode-specific workflows, complexity-aware selection), mandatory checkpoint enforcement, loop completion detection, context management, fresh start mechanism, spike-to-plan application, worklog sync automation, consolidated super-agents (18→9), XML-structured prompts, unified language patterns, strategic model selection (opus/sonnet/haiku), and comprehensive documentation (agents.md, testing.md). Recommended workflow: spike → fresh → continue loop for optimal context management.
